description: Header file defining interfaces for internal system event messaging, including message handling, serialization, and communication functions used within the sys event library.

methods.name: SE_print_message
methods.description: Prints a system event message of a specified type.

methods.name: SE_string2size
methods.description: Calculates the size in bytes required to store a string as a system event message string.

methods.name: SE_print_message_hdr
methods.description: Prints the header of a system event message.

methods.name: SE_msg_add_string
methods.description: Adds a string to a system event message buffer with length and 32-bit alignment.

methods.name: SE_msg_hdr_mbytes_fixup
methods.description: Calculates and updates the size of a system event message header.

methods.name: SE_msg_receive
methods.description: Receives a message from a file descriptor, blocking until a message arrives.

methods.name: SE_minimal_blocking_msg_receive
methods.description: Receives a message with a short wait, returning immediately if no message is available.

methods.name: SE_msg_send
methods.description: Sends a system event message through a file descriptor.

methods.name: SE_msg_send_receive
methods.description: Sends a message and waits for a reply.

methods.name: SE_msg_prepare
methods.description: Prepares a system event message buffer with specified type and sender.

methods.name: SE_msg_get_data
methods.description: Extracts data payload from a message.

methods.name: SE_msg_send_data
methods.description: Sends data over a file descriptor.

methods.name: SE_msg_add_data
methods.description: Adds data to an existing message buffer.
